homePage.title: Welcome to EmergQR
homePage.subtitle: Your critical medical information, always accessible when you need it most.
homePage.description: Manage your health profile, emergency contacts, allergies, and much more. All in one place, secure and available 24/7.

aboutUsPage.title: About Us
aboutUsPage.missionText: At EmergQR, our mission is to empower people to take control of their health information. We believe that fast and secure access to medical data can save lives in emergency situations and improve the quality of daily medical care.
aboutUsPage.visionText: We strive for a future where every individual owns their medical history, breaking the barriers of traditional health systems. We want EmergQR to be the universal tool that seamlessly and securely connects patients, doctors, and emergency services.
aboutUsPage.valuesText:
- **Privacy and Security:** Protecting your data is our highest priority.
- **Accessibility:** Your information, available to you and whoever you decide, anytime, anywhere.
- **Empowerment:** We give you the tools to proactively manage your health.
- **Innovation:** We are constantly looking for new ways to improve healthcare through technology.

servicesPage.title: Our Services
servicesPage.subtitle: Everything you need to manage your health comprehensively.
servicesPage.service1_text: Your vital information (blood type, allergies, conditions) instantly accessible through a QR code.
servicesPage.service2_text: Keep a chronological record of your surgeries, diagnoses, treatments, and studies. Upload and organize your medical documents.
servicesPage.service3_text: Log your medications, dosages, and schedules. Set reminders so you never miss a dose.
servicesPage.service4_text: Maintain an updated list of contacts to notify in case of an emergency, accessible from your public profile.
servicesPage.service5_text: Access your information from anywhere, whether from our mobile application or this web platform.

delete_account.title: Danger Zone
delete_account.warningText: This action is irreversible. By deleting your account, all your medical data, profile, and contacts will be permanently deleted. You will not be able to recover your account.
delete_account.dialogContent: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account and all associated data. Do you wish to continue?
